column4: Just insatalled ubuntu 6.06, wireless nice etc using WEP, Im getting really long ping response times, they are very sporadic, any ideas how I can sort this or is it network dependant??
on ubuntu, firefox takes ages to load any page! when i try a big dload im getting 360Kbs+, whats up with that??
dpn type in the address bar "about:config"  tell me when that is done
done
dpn type "ipv6" in the filter bar
it will change to false, close it
then you have some other issue
sorry, do i want to make it true?
no you need it to be false
ok
sorry make it true
then you put in a web page it should improve speed
ok I have: user set boolean true
put in a different url - www.bbc.co.uk ?
still slow..im getting long response times when pinging, what can I do to sort that?
that is not good - but that seems to be not a firefox issue
whos your ISP?
not eircom that is for sure :-)
(shhh btinternet)
scumbag..British Telecom
ehh cheaper telecom  I spent 20 years working for that other crowd - and less of the language thanks
eircomedy
we chat in #ubuntu-offotpic this one is strictly (supposedly) support
